Title: Elsa & Fred
Writer: Marcos Carnevale, Marcela Guerty, Lily Ann Martin
Actors: Manuel Alexandre, China Zorrilla, Blanca Portillo, José Ángel Egido
Plot: When the retired seventy-seven years old hypochondriac widower Fred moves to an apartment in Madrid, his temperamental daughter Cuca has an incident with his next door neighbor, the elder Argentinean Elsa. Later, they meet each other and Elsa seduces Fred with her reckless behavior and view of life and they have a romance.
